snippet: The statement by the board comes a day after a select committee of the British Parliament found Mr. Murdoch was "not a fit person" to run a huge international company.
abstract: The statement by the board comes a day after a select committee of the British Parliament found Mr. Murdoch was "not a fit person" to run a huge international company.

headline.main: News Corp.'s Board Says It Has 'Full Confidence' in Murdoch
